title: Waymo tells police how to break into and disable its self-driving cars
text: Waymo tells police how to break into and disable its self-driving cars Sara Salinas Reblog The instructions appear in a 41-page booklet provided to law enforcement as something of an introduction to the fully self-driving cars. The self-driving unit of Alphabet has pulled away from some of its autonomous driving rivals in recent months, as Uber and Tesla have each faced reports of costly and even fatal accidents. Waymo is telling police in California exactly how to break into its autonomous cars in the event of an emergency, according to documents reviewed by tech news site IEEE Spectrum .
